Great class for all who really want to know more about marketing!

There’s definitely no exaggeration that this is one of my favorite courses in NCCU. Strongly recommended! I can easily tell that how much effort Professor Park has put into this course by the enriched content and his fluent delivery skills.
Professor is really nice

Thank you for giving us such a good course!
Through your passionate and professional teaching, this course really increases my interest in the marketing field! Feeling so grateful that you came to NCCU!

This class and the professor are both definitely recommended to everyone. The professor is willing to listen to students' thought and is a great help or guide to those in need on every aspect. Best professor in NCCU.

Best class that I’ve ever taken.
Dr. Park gave us various topics of marketing in each class. He did a lot of work in preparing the materials and did brought excellent contents to us. He is not only a researcher but actually an “educator”!

老師懂的很多也給予學生很多的機會發表自己的看法，雖然作業有點多但都是簡單可以完成的小作業！
老師也會分配時間跟每一組一起吃晚餐聊天，是堂很棒的課！
I like this course because the teacher is so nice. Hope he can also do a great job next semester.
Mr.Park is kind and considerate to his students. And the contents in this class are variable. It's a nice course.

One of the best courses I have taken in my entire 4 years! Thanks Steven for all the amazing moment during class! 超級推薦的一堂好課！全英文授課一開始會有點辛苦，但老師講英文很標準，英聽能力一學期完會大幅提高。老師很專業之前也有三星的工作經驗，選取的指定閱讀也都是符合科技潮流的，不過小組討論不少，英文寫作能力也會提高。老師也提供職涯諮詢，真的是大學遇過最暖心教授
非常推的老師!

老師非常親切，與學生互動良好，真的是很照顧學生的好老師～推推推
Professor Park really cares about students and this is a heart-warming course!
政大最好教授
Its a really great course, combining theories and practical things. Gained lots of knowledge and experienced lots of new things!

the professor has great experience and knowledge not only in marketing management but also in many other area. therefore the class is inspiring and interesting. strongly recommend this course to all students.
Appropriate teaching material and good course atmosphere. The most interesting course I have had in my college life. Thanks for your inspiration!
